rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming area with ample natural light and ventilation, aligned towards the eastern side to maximize morning sunlight.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area designed for family gatherings, featuring large windows on the east to embrace natural light and proper cross ventilation.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An adjoining space to the kitchen with eastern exposure to ensure bright morning ambiance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen layout with sufficient ventilation and a north-eastern window for optimum light; designed keeping Vastu principles in mind.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet study area located near the living room with natural lighting from the east and a view of landscaped surroundings.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A comfortable guest suite placed in a corner ensuring privacy; includes an adjoining small balcony to promote cross-ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a west facing window to ensure cool evening light and proper ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom (2)
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring privacy; located in a quieter section of the floor plan with north exposure for balanced natural light.

openings.description: Large windows in living and dining areas to enhance morning sunlight ingress.
Main entrance door with an overhang for natural light diffusion.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: Expanded master bedroom on the first floor with a private balcony overlooking the garden; benefits from cooler afternoon breezes.

rooms.name: Bedroom (3)
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for privacy and comfort, located in a quiet corner with natural lighting.

rooms.name: Study/Work Room
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace incorporating natural light from eastern windows to promote productivity while respecting Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-ventilated bathroom with north-eastern orientation for a positive energy flow.

openings.description: Private balcony door providing access to an outdoor space with natural light and fresh air.

additional_details.vastu_considerations: The design incorporates Vastu principles by placing the entrance in the east, bedrooms with north-eastern orientation for health and well-being, and ensuring that all living spaces receive ample natural light and proper ventilation.
